item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Release Date Leaked
item.content:encoded:
A new report reveals the release date for Samsung’s upcoming flagship model, the Galaxy S26.

The Galaxy S series is the top range of smartphones released by the South Korean tech giant, Samsung, and it seems that their next instalment will be revealed very soon. At the moment, there is no information about the new features or any details regarding the tech; only the release date has been revealed.

Samsung Galaxy S26 to Be Released in March 2026

The release date for the Samsung Galaxy S26 was revealed in a report by reliable insider billbil-kun (translated by Google). According to the report, the Samsung Galaxy S26 will be revealed on February 25, 2026, and will seemingly be released in Europe on March 11, 2026. The release dates for other locations are expected to align with the European date, and the models to be released include Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra. The release will be accompanied by a range of accessories for the smartphone.

As mentioned above, the technical specifications haven’t been revealed, but considering this is their top-of-the-line model, users can expect a notable overhaul over the previous model. Additionally, pricing details haven’t been revealed, but the report notes that prices may increase slightly when localized, depending on the market.

In other tech news, LEGO revealed its new SMART Play platform at CES 2026. Additionally, Corsair’s new keyboard has a built-in Elgato Stream Deck. Are you looking forward to the release of the Samsung Galaxy S26? Leave your thoughts on all this and more down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more tech news from Insider Gaming, read about Sony patenting new AI ‘ghost player’ tech, which can basically play the game for you. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Intel Integrated Graphics To Get Big Performance Boost, It’s Claimed
item.content:encoded:
Intel integrated graphics seem to be getting a significant upgrade with the next generation. One known leaker has gone online to give insight into just how big of a boost they’ll be getting.

In a post on social media, known hardware leaker OneRaichu spoke about the in-development Intel Nova Lake CPUs and what it entails from the integrated graphics perspective.

They say that the new architecture, Xe3P, which is expected to launch with the new CPU lineup in 2027, will see a performance uptick of “20-25%” with “even more [performance] uplift for the Xe3P-12C.”

Currently, Intel is preparing to launch its Panther Lake Core Ultra 300 series processors. Those will feature the Xe3 architecture that is also expected to be the main architecture behind the Intel Celestial graphics card line up. Those aren’t expected to be seen, however, until late 2026.

As with all rumors and leaks, until it’s made official or confirmed by Insider Gaming, take the information with a grain of salt. Even from leakers that have been reliable in the past.

What do you think about the rumored performance jump for Intel’s integrated graphics? Does it really matter to you? Leave your thoughts down in the comments and join the discussion in the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For the latest Insider Gaming, check out details on Corsair’s new flagship keyboard, Galleon 100 SD, that includes a built-in Stream Deck. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

ASUS ROG Announces Kojima-Themed Gaming Laptop

At CES 2026, ASUS ROG unveiled a new collaboration with Kojima Productions, introducing a themed gaming laptop.

Nvidia Isn’t Announcing A New GPU At CES 2026

Despite rumors leading up to the annual event, Nvidia has confirmed that it won’t be announcing a new GPU at CES 2026.

NVIDIA to Re-Release GeForce RTX 3060 in Q1 2026, It’s Claimed

A new claim states that NVIDIA will bring back GeForce RtX 3060 GPUs in Q1 2026 to battle the ongoing memory shortage.

Top Fortnite Players Can Now Get a Free GPU for Playing Fortnite

Amid the rising cost of computer components, NVIDIA is distributing a free GPU in an upcoming Fortnite tournament.

item.title: Is Quarantine Zone: The Last Check on PlayStation 5 & Xbox Series X|S? All Platforms, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Quarantine Zone: The Last Check is a unique hybrid as it features puzzle, strategy, and action elements rolled into one. You need to be a detective one second, and a tough decision-making zombie killer the next. If Quarantine Zone: The Last Check has piqued your interest, this guide will break down its platforms.

Gaming would be infinitely easier if every new title were released on every available platform. Obviously, this is never going to happen for various reasons, but it means we always have platform problems and console conundrums. Quarantine Zone: The Last Check is the perfect example, as it’s a promising indie title, but the audience doesn’t know where to seek shelter.

Time to see if PlayStation and Xbox owners have missed the quarantine period.

Can You Play Quarantine Zone: The Last Check On PlayStation?

For the time being, Quarantine Zone: The Last Check is aptly being quarantined away from all PlayStation consoles.

Despite the interest and polish of the product, there will be no PlayStation port of The Last Check for now. The PS4 and PS5 consoles are powerful beasts, but any infected beasts are being kept on PC for now.

This isn’t to say a PS5 (or PS4) port won’t happen in the future. It’s happened many times in recent memory where a game does really well on PC and Steam, and later commissions a console release—REPO being a great example of this.

Stay tuned for future updates on The Last Check coming to PS4 or PS5.

Can You Play Quarantine Zone: The Last Check On Xbox?

If you’re an Xbox One or Xbox Series X|S owner, you also have to miss out on Quarantine Zone: The Last Check’s initial launch, with no Xbox port being talked about.

There will be no console launch for The Last Check: PlayStation, Xbox, and even Nintendo Switch 1 and 2 owners need to hang fire at the checkpoint for now. Brigada and Devolver need to see how Quarantine Zone: The Last Check pans out on PC first. If it sells well, it’s reviewed well, and its player numbers can be sustained, an Xbox launch down the line is not out of the question.

Have you had a chance to play Quarantine Zone: The Last Check, either through its free demo or an earlier playtest? Share your feedback and thoughts through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

There is much more fun content to check out here at IG, including the biggest and best remakes & remasters coming in 2026, the 9 biggest Nintendo Switch & Switch 2 games coming in 2026, and the 8 biggest PlayStation games coming in 2026.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1666: Hints and Answer for January 10, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1666 for January 10, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 10, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1666 will likely be pretty easy. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 3.6 of 6 guesses. That makes it easier than the 5-guess average from January 9.

General Wordle Hints For January 10

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is often used to describe a state, not a permanent trait.
  • Hint 2: It appears frequently in medical, psychological, or emotional contexts.
  • Hint 3: The word suggests intensity and speed, rather than calm or control.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see this word paired with behavior or energy than with physical objects.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1666 for January 10, 2026.

Starter Words For January 10, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CANID
  • MAINS
  • CANDY
  • AMINO
  • CAMEL

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1666 On January 10, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: MANIC

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

MANIC is an adjective or noun. As an adjective, it means “characterizing, denoting, or affected by mania”. As a noun, it means “a person afflicted with mania”.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1665 on January 9, 2026

Answer: EIGHT

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1666?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 11 will be Wordle Game #1667.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.
